reviewText: Will not work in any of my blue ray DVD's!

It's a Region A & B Blu Ray which plays in the US beautifully. The picture, sound and performance are excellent. This movie is an excellent German Action Drama by a renowned German Director who also stars, writes and produces this film. The Discs themselves play on US blu ray players fine, though the special features have no English captions, but the film does, and don't count on the digital copy to be easily playable in the US. This whole package is worth every penny.
This was an excellent movie! Non-stop action! It was very entertaining and fun to watch! Great acting and shooting scenes! Very impressive!
